channel.title: Mount Olympus: Evolution - Choose a Faction!
channel.description:
(THREAD UNDER CONSTRUCTION)
[center][FONT=Impact][size=5][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/3vpye.png[/img] [url=http://www.mount-olympus.net/]Website[/url] | [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/6duwsk.png[/img] [url=http://http://forums.mount-olympus.net/]Community][/url] | [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2s1reqe.png[/img] [url=http://"http://www.mount-olympus.net/play-now.html"]Play Now][/url][/size][/FONT]
[font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=5]Mount Olympus: Evolution is currently: ONLINE[/size]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=5]Mount Olympus V1 Media[/size][/b]
[size=3]Mount Olympus features: [/size][url=http://"http://www.mount-olympus.net/media.html"]CLICK HERE[/url]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xN9Pz3sXaEs
[b][size=5]Mount Olympus: Evolution... COMING SOON![/size][/b]
[size=4][url=http://"http://i.imgur.com/9m90Ivv.jpg"]CLICK HERE[/url] to open Mount Olympus: Evolution Full Map[/size] [img]http://forums.mount-olympus.net/MO-AD.jpg[/img] [font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=8]Future Updates[/size][/font] ([i]The below updates are in no specific order[/i])
[size=5]- Item & Boss renames true to Greek Mythology (Started)[/size] [size=5]- Faction Point System (Started)[/size] [size=5]- Greek Myths (Bosses)[/size] [size=5]- Individual Story lines[/size] [size=5]- Dynamic events (Random MOB raids)[/size] [size=5]- Faction Highscores[/size] [size=5]- Faction Rankings[/size] [size=5]- Faction Specific Quests/Achievements[/size] [size=5]- Claiming territory[/size] [size=5]- Item abilities[/size] [size=5]- NEW prayer access dependant on Faction[/size] [size=5]MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED![/size]
Base: Original Matrix 718 Developers: Zeus and Hades Start date: February, 1st 2013 Thanks for reading! [/center]
